metadata.title: CVE-2023-52426 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows recursive XML Entity Expansion if XML_DTD isundefined at compile time.

criterions.comment: expat package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
